contentList.content: Wall hit points increase by 10 per spell level

Make a pillar of divine fire roar down from the heavens like the wrath of affronted angels. Potentially Burns targets, fiends and undeads receive Holy Burns instead.

Allows you to cast Flamestrike Remembrance and Flamestrike Echo.
Can recast an echo of <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_FlameStrike">Flamestrike</LSTag>.
Make a small pillar of divine fire roar down from the heavens like the wrath of affronted angels.
Can recast an echo of <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="SYR_Target_FlameStrike_Recast_A">Flamestrike Remembrance</LSTag>.
Make a tiny pillar of divine fire roar down from the heavens.
